pages.title: Intergrations Manual
pages.text: $(bold)Welcome to the Warium Manual!$()$(br)This book walks you through Warium and its addons. "Knowledge is the difference between victory and defeat." - TheMCGuy101 2025

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: Start at $(l:warium_integrations:overview/contents)Contents$(/l) to jump into each chapter. Sections cover motors, inputs/outputs, machines, and ordnance, with multiblock overlays where available. Ordinance overlays currently have a display bug; fixes are in progress.
